}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "48DAXA06.SGA" and "2013/09/03" is silkscreened on the board. :OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]] {{See also|Unex DNXA-GO1}}
===Features=== <!-- Features high-power 5GHz 802.11ac 3x3 and external Rx filter, DAXA-GO1 delivers up to 1.3Gbps :data rate and provides the excellent radio rejection against the interfering signal from :the 2nd Wi-Fi module on dual-band dual con-current applications. --> *802.11an/ac (5GHz), DFS, MU-MIMO *High power (23dBm), ext. PA/LNA *Data rate: up to 1.3Gbps (20/40/80MHz)
==Links of Interest== [https://www.unex.com.tw/download/577c6df1e0a83/5 Datasheet]
